amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the DOE Departmental Administration account by $27,950,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 18 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce funding for Departmental Administration account by $27,950,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Foxx amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 134 - 293 (Roll no. 517).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A016) offered by Ms. Foxx.
